extension_description.message: Changes the background of Note to the more eye-friendly colors.

color_scheme_preference_caption.description: The caption for the preference that changes the color scheme.

color_scheme_preference_auto_option_labe.description: The label for the option that changes the color scheme based on the system preferences.

color_scheme_preference_light_option_lab.description: The label for the option that changes the color scheme to light.

color_scheme_preference_dark_option_labe.description: The label for the option that changes the color scheme to dark.
